title: tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.ResourceExhaustedError: 2 root error(s) found.
body:
Hello. I have GTX 1050 Ti. The resolution of my image is 1920 by 1080 by 3. I am getting this error and I don't know how to fix this. Please tell me how to do this. Here is the full log:

```
Using TensorFlow backend.

  _np_qint8 = np.dtype([("qint8", np.int8, 1)])
/home/sarim/PycharmProjects/trajectory_pred/venv3.7/lib/python3.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/dtypes.py:517: FutureWarning: Passing (type, 1) or '1type' as a synonym of type is deprecated; in a future version of numpy, it will be understood as (type, (1,)) / '(1,)type'.
```
